c74object.name: fl.source~
c74object.digest: Captures audio from the host environment and outputs the most recent values as frames.
c74object.description: The size of captured frames is variable. Latency is equivalent to the length of the captured frame. The length of the internal buffer determines the maximum frame length.

entry.name: 0. /buffer_size [instantiation double]
entry.description: Sets the internal buffer size in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 1. /length [int]
entry.description: Sets the length of output frames in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 2. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used to determine the buffer size and output length.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds

entry.name: 3. /delay [double]
entry.description: Sets the input delay in the units specified by the units parameter: N.B. - there is a minimum delay or latency of the output length.
